defensive_traits.name: Hardy
defensive_traits.description: Geit gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison spells and spell-like abilities.

defensive_traits.name: Mountain-Born
defensive_traits.description: Geit gain a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics checks made to cross narrow ledges.

feat_&_skill_traits.name: Craftsman
feat_&_skill_traits.description: Geit gain a +2 racial bonus on Craft & Profession checks when using metal or stone.

feat_&_skill_traits.name: Stonecunning
feat_&_skill_traits.description: Geit gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks to notice unusual stonework, such as traps and hidden doors. They receive a check to notice such features whenever they pass within 10 feet, whether or not they are actively looking.

Movement Traits: Mountaineer: Geit are immune to altitude sickness and do not lose their Dex bonus to AC when making Climb or Acrobatics checks to cross narrow or slippery surfaces.
Rock Stepper: Geit can skillfully navigate rocky terrain, ignoring difficult terrain caused by rubble, broken ground, or steep stairs.
Offense Traits: Frenzy: Once a day, Geit can go into a frenzy upon taking damage. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute (10 rounds) and adds a +2 racial bonus to Constitution and Strength, but a -2 to AC.
Hatred: Geit gain a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against Plant Creatures.
Weapon Familiarity: Geit are proficient with Warhammers and Dwarven weapons.
